synopsis.text: Hoshitani Yuuta enrolls in Ayanagi Academy, a prestigious school focused on nurturing musical talent, with dreams of entering the show business world. At the pinnacle of the music department sits the Kao Kai, an elite group of the three top students who wield significant influence. The fastest way into the department is getting chosen for the Star Frame class directly taught by the Kao Kai members. Yuuta joins forces with four other struggling students - Nayuki, Tsukigami, Tengenji, and Kuga. Despite their individual challenges, the five catch the attention of Kao Kai's Ootori. Now Team Ootori, the motley crew must overcome opposition from talented rivals and their own shortcomings under Ootori's eccentric tutelage. Their goal is to perform in Ayanagi Academy's prestigious annual musical showcase, the Ayanagi Festival. It's an uphill battle for the underdogs as they chase their musical dreams at this highly competitive school.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
